img_above_text:
# The Forest of Wolves
While he may not be Sun Wukong, the Destined One is not above a bit of trickery and foolishness — as evidenced by luring some lesser Wolf Guais into trying to take a bite out of him disguised as a peach.

Centuries later, an elder monkey recounts the tale of the Monkey King, and decrees that a Destined One may yet be able to follow in Sun Wukong’s footsteps by seeking out the Six Relics of the Monkey King’s Spirit - the Six Senses of the Great Sage. As luck would have it, you are that Destined One!Forest of Wolves

img_summary: The image, titled "Wukong Wolves 1.jpg" from the document "The Forest of Wolves," depicts a scene where the protagonist, referred to as the Destined One, confronts two wolf-like creatures in a forest setting. This visual aligns with the preceding text, which narrates the tale of the Monkey King and the quest to follow in his footsteps by seeking out the Six Relics of the Monkey King’s Spirit. The image likely illustrates a moment of conflict or challenge faced by the Destined One, emphasizing the adventurous and perilous journey within the Forest of Wolves.
